detail_desc: Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties at the side. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a flounce at the top and high-cut legs.
Short jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, welt side pockets and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid to give your favourite items in silk, wool and other delicate materials the treatment they deserve. Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 14 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Mesh trainers with wide, wrapover elastic straps at the front and a fixed tongue with a loop. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length skirt in a textured weave containing glittery threads. Concealed zip at the back, a sewn-in wrapover at the front with an opening at the hem, and raw edges. Lined.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of treggings. Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline, opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with gathered elastication to create a puff effect.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.
Trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

Set with a top and trousers in a cotton knit. Top with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a printed cotton weave with elasticated smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides with press-studs that can be opened all the way down.
Lightly padded, quilted Alice band in imitation leather.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a lined gusset and string back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with embroidery. Elastication with a frill trim at the top and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.

Lined bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric with removable inserts and narrow, decorative trims. Slightly wider elastic shoulder straps, an elastic hem and a fastening at the back with a metal hook.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastication at the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Glittery, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Short-sleeved dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons at the front. Elastication and a drawstring with twisted ties at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Short top in soft, sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with embroidery, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots with rounded toes and a zip in the side. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Fitted gilet in fast-drying, breathable thermal fleece with a hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front and mesh-lined side pockets with a zip. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back. Elastication at the top of the back and an elasticated hem with a decorative bow.

V-neck T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a double trim around the neckline and sleeves. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and gently tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Joggers in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist with contrasting colour ties, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, a jacquard-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in woven fabric with hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly and side pockets. High waist with pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned satin with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Shorter, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Blouse in airy linen. Wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Dungarees in cotton twill with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Seam at the waist with belt loops, a concealed zip in one side, patch pockets at the sides and leg pockets. Loose-fitting legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, side stripes and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a felted wool blend with a collar with an adjustable storm tab underneath and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Shoulder tabs with a button, loose yoke front and back with a button, side pockets and two inner pockets. Adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim made from an extra soft, shape-retaining Tencel™ lyocell blend. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length dress in soft, gently draping, patterned jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a narrow, detachable tie belt with metal ends. Unlined.
Derby shoes in glittery imitation leather with satin ribbon lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Imitation leather linings with a metallic finish, canvas insoles and rubber soles.

Shorter jacket in a lightweight weave with a double-layered drawstring hood, stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Large flap chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic with a globe-shaped pendant. Length approx. 3.5 cm.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves, a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and smocking at the waist.
Sun hat in woven fabric with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in sturdy, patterned fabric with a visible zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Slides in imitation leather with a wide foot strap and imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Fully lined, smocked swimsuit containing glittery threads with a low-cut back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Joggers in lightweight cotton denim. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and detachable tie belt, front pockets and gently tapered legs.
Knee-length shirt dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, button placket, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
5-pocket, ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and legs with twisted seams and narrow hems with slits.
Joggers in soft, airy, patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
